regionInformation.title: Region
regionInformation.description: Only one region is available in free trial. Services and runtime entities are specific to a region. Upgrade to enterprise to gain access to multiple regions.

acceptInvitation.passwordHelpText: Please set a password to finish creating your account.

login.unauthenticated: Incorrect username or password. Please try again.
login.accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Reset your password to log in now
login.loginWithCredentials: Log in with email and password
login.loginTextSSOAriaLabel: Log in with your single sign-on provider

forgotPassword.success: If an account exists for the email provided, you will receive a link to reset your password. If the email doesn't appear within a few minutes, be sure to check your spam folder.

general.serviceUnavailable: Service unavailable. Please try again later.
general.recaptchaError: We could not verify that you're human. Refresh the page to try again.
